issue.title: [Python] Make Schema hashable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3901](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3901). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently pa.Schema is not hashable, however all of its components are hashable

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3901?focusedCommentId=16704031) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
At some point we should hash in C++ so that these objects can be used in hash tables

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3901?focusedCommentId=17392991) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Looks like this was implemented in ARROW-2624.
